title: Distribution of Grant Aid per Full-Time Undergraduate by Source and Sector, 2011–12

metadata.source: Sandy Baum, Jennifer Ma, Matea Pender, D'Wayne Bell, Trends in Student Aid 2015 (New York: College Board, 2015), based on data from the National Sandy Baum, Jennifer Ma, Matea Pender, D'Wayne Bell, Trends in Student Aid 2015 (New York: College Board, 2015), based on data from the National Postsecondary Student Aid Study (NPSAS), 2012.
metadata.notes: Averages include both grant recipients and those who did not receive aid.
